reviews.sentence: Great. This hotel was great. The staff I encountered in the hotel were all friendly and accommodating. The hotel rooms are clean and modern and the meeting spaces are spacious. The staff in the meeting rooms were the stars.

Great place. I would definitely recommend staying here they have excellent service. Make sure you go see Jil at the bar she will definitely take great care of you. The room service is always spectacular and do not forget about the breakfast.

Weekend stay. This hotel is very nice Close to major shopping and food. The hotel staff were all very nice. They did have a lot of tiny worms that were crawling on the floor and one ended up in our bed on the second floor. Hotel changed our bedding and no more problems after that. I would stay here again. My favorite part was the free washer and dryer on the 2nd floor.

This hotel is surprisingly one of the greatest hotels I have ever come to. The hotel staff was extremely polite and accommodating. Everything was immaculate remarkable. If you have not tried the Hilton Garden Inn and you are looking for a great hotel do not pass this one up.
Great service huge rooms amazing food. I highly recommend this hotel.

Excellent Customer Service. I am a regular at the HGI. The customer service here is awesome. In fact it is almost perfect The staff is friendly and they have learned my name and my preferences. Jil at the bar is extremely friendly and provides consistent service. Tim the general manager is on top of things. I will not stay anywhere else.

Great Staff Great Handicap Accessible Rooms. This hotel was great. My boyfriend had a broken leg with a full case so we booked an handicap accessible room. The room was right by the elevator spacious and he was easily able to get around in the bathroom. If booking an accessible room make sure that you specify between handicap accessible or hearing accessible and let them know if you want a bathtub or shower because some of the accessible rooms have either or. Every staff member we came in contact with was fantastic. We did not have the breakfast but it looked and smelled delicious. We will definitely stay at this hotel again.

No Title. Nice place great location friendly staff plenty of hot water in the bathroom uncomfortable pillows. Get a room on the front side of the hotel the rear side is along I85 and being a light sleeper I wish I had realized this upon check in.

Soccer wekend. This is a fantastic place to stay great employees Andre stood out he referred us to a great local restaurant we were n’t disappointed. They also have a great workout room clean and awesome breakfast. Enjoyed our stay. Thanks.
Great hotel. Very friendly staff and clean comfortable rooms.

Stay Away. Stay Away. AC prevented sleep noisy and off and on regulrly. Business center had one computer and no working facilities. Staff disrespects guests. Laundry expensive and no change machine in laundry.

3 Day Stay with Friends. Central location was what attracted us to this hotel. Bathroom was small A C noisy. Each bed had 3 pillows two standard size and 1 king size and the two standard pillowcases looked yellowish while the king size pillow case was white. Only mirror in the room was in the bathroom. Breakfast was okay but nothing special. Breakfast staff was why I rated service very good. No newspapers in the lobby.

Hilton Garden Inn Greenville stay. The facility was fantastic. The staff was knowledgeable efficient and friendly. Breakfast was very good with a nice selection. Custom orders were available but I did not need to use that part of the service.

The evening staff were friendly and welcoming. The room appeared to be clean but for a Hilton brand it could have been better. I found food on the floor and trash in the cabinet underneath the tv. Also I asked for extra creamer and sugar as a special request before I checked in. That request was ignored. The morning staff the waitress in the dining area in particular was not attentive. I wanted to take my breakfast back to the room and she said that she would get my ticket. She forgot about me so I ended up sitting there eating cold food since I thought she was going to bring my ticket. By the time I was done I had to hunt her down for my ticket. I had a question but before I could even get the question out she walked off. There were three other patrons in the dining area so I do n’t understand why she seemed so rushed and rude nor attentive. Plus there was another waiter helping out on the floor. Otherwise the rest of the crew were great.

The evening staff were friendly and welcoming. The room appeared to be clean but for a Hilton brand it could have been better. I found food on the floor and trash in the cabinet underneath the tv. Also I asked for extra creamer and sugar as a special request before I checked in. That request was ignored. The morning staff the waitress in the dining area in particular was not attentive. I wanted to take my breakfast back to the room and she said that she would get my ticket. She forgot about me so I ended up sitting there eating cold food since I thought she was going to bring my ticket. By the time I was done I had to hunt her down for my ticket. I had a question but before I could even get the question out she walked off. There were three other patrons in the dining area so I do n’t understand why she seemed so rushed and rude nor attentive. Plus there was another waiter helping out on the floor. Otherwise the rest of the crew were great.

The rooms were nice once they gave us one that was assigned to another guest. The Bacon. The service was aweful server barely checked on us and most of the food was cold except for thw bacon. When we ordered room service the night before it took over an hour for food and it took 30 minutes for them to bring my credit card back to the room.

Looking to move to Greenville area. Arrived on Thursday May 16 and wanted a room until Sunday May 18. The staff at front desk was very friendly and gave me the AAA rate. When we arrived to our room and went to put our water in the refrigerator we found a empty beer container and a box of half eaten cake along with only 3 sets of towels for a room that slept 4. The first morning we went down for breakfast to find that we would be charged 270 for the 2 of us. Wow rather expensive for the buffet which at other hotels such as Hampton Inn is free. I must mention that we could order from a menu but with Cracker Barrel a block away we chose that route. When we got back to our room that night it had been cleaned but we had no towels. My finance is a member of Mariot rewards and when we went to front desk the manager agreed to give her 370 bonus points which she is still waiting on. Hotel was clean and conveniently located to the area.

Hotel was nice room was not clean. Microwave did not work. Door was wide open upon checking into room. Digital key did not work hence reason as to why digital Key did n’t work. Refrigerator was not working either so milk spoiled. Front desk representative was not helpful. Did not specify breakfast or reason as to why room was changed upon digital checkin. I asked the front desk for a bag for my Hilton rewards water in which he replied for what as if I had not had thirty bags in my hand and no greeting I had to walk up to the desk to get the things that I needed. Higher expectations for Hilton hotels as to why they are the only brand that I do stick with.

Quiet Good location. The hotel was quiet even though it was full. Our beds were not top of hte line but were comfortable We were overall satisfied but could have gotten better cleaning. Our room was partially cleaned once in the four day stay. The crews were behind every day and were not finished by 5 one evening.

Excellent Choice for the Area. Have stayed at several properties in the area and I must say this is one is excellent. Normal HGI set up. Rooms were clean and as expected. Common areas and facilities were in good order. What sets it apart is the customer service. Everyone I encountered went above and beyond what is normal.

Beautiful hotel wonderful food. Great service but lack of comfortable atmosphere and maintenance problems. Beautiful hotel wonderful food. Great service but lack of comfortable atmosphere and maintenance issues. A great remodel with exception of maintenance issues in the restroom and also terrible beds with all four pillows. Stayed at this hotel many times before and was always amazed. Something got lost in the transition.
